Dear Mr* Street*
I note Ken Wright's letter to you of January
10* It occurs to me that Belmont and I might discuss
the possibilities when we meet in Ann Arbor next week*
I assume he will be present for the JCET meeting.
If the suggestion has some i.*rit, why don't you
send along some of your ideas and we will confer?
Sincerely yours.
